name: Augmentra
tag_list: navigation, location, mobile, gps, content, consumer, professional, outdoors, hiking, fishing, cycling
overview:
Augmentra Ltd is the Cambridge UK based Angel funded mobile app software development company behind ViewRanger GPS. ViewRanger GPS is the award winning mobile phone app, with online community and trip planning website, which delivers GPS navigation, mapping, tracking, location sharing, and location-based content to outdoor activity enthusiasts and outdoor professionals worldwide.

ViewRanger has been running on a range of Symbian S60 mobile devices for over two years and in 2010 launched on Apple iOS (iPhone/iPad) and on Android OS. Versions of ViewRanger GPS either provide global map coverage from Open sourced mapping, or premium topographic map data available for a growing number of countries, including Belgium, Czech Republic, Finland, France, Germany, Great Britain, Holland, Ireland, parts of Italy, Norway, New Zealand, Slovenia, Sweden, Switzerland, USA.

ViewRanger GPS has won awards for innovation from Nokia, Ordnance Survey, and the app is used and endorsed by a growing number of search and rescue organizations.

Augmentra Ltd is partnered with national mapping agencies across Europe including Ordnance Survey in the UK, BKG in Germany and with a range of content publishers, including National Geographic in North America.
